name: Wasoobi
overview:
Wasoobi is a start-up that is the combination of a social network, specialized interest based content portal, and one-to-one advertising network all packaged into what we describe as a Personal Interest Network. Itâ€™s a place where users will have the opportunity to explore digital content (audio & video) related to their specific personal interests, passions, and hobbies, as well as connect with friends and other like-minded individuals. But thereâ€™s more, users will also be encouraged to provide ongoing personal profile data that enables advertisers to reach them with highly targeted advertising thatâ€™s always personally relevant.

Users will know how their data is being used, and with Wasoobi, they will actually share in the value of their personal information by receiving a percentage of the revenue their data generates. The Wasoobi model provides a win-win-win scenario for everyone. It provides users with content and financial rewards, content creators with an additional revenue and distribution channel, and advertisers of all sizes with highly targeted customer prospects.
